DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Psoriasis Severity Its Psychosocial Impact Using Simplified Psoriasis Index ( SPI ) , Well Long-term Safety , Tolerability Efficacy Secukinumab Administered Subcutaneously Patients With Moderate Severe Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: patient history chronic , moderate severe plaque psoriasis ( PASI ≥12 ; BSA ( body surface area ) ≥10 IGA mod 2011 ( Investigator 's Global Assessment ) ≥3 ) least 6 month patient candidate systemic therapy . informed consent . previous treatment agent target IL17 ( interleukine17 ) IL17 receptor . recent treatment topical treatment ( 2 week ) , systemic agent ( 4 week methotrexate , Ciclosporine A ; systemic retinoids systemic treatment ) , TNF ( tumor necrosis factor ) inhibitor ( 3 month ) IL12/23 inhibitor ( 6 month ) .
